messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 2420
messages.msgSnippet: Ooooh, Avila Beach? I haven t been there for ages!! We wanted to live in San Luis Obispo (just up the road) and I still dream of it. Ren, missing Cali ( and
messages.messageBody:
Ooooh, Avila Beach? I haven't been there for ages!! We wanted to live in San
Luis Obispo (just up the road) and I still dream of it.

Ren, missing Cali ( and the entire West Coast for that matter)


I grew up in San Luis Obispo and I only moved as far away as Berkeley but I
still miss it. Avila Beach is the last great undiscovered beach town. Won't
be for long though. Unical bought up the town (to clean up a spill) and it's
getting swankier.

Pam T.


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
